sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Removing read-only for 'table' field in Contact and Contact Responsibility tables</description>
        <name>Contact mgmt - Fix table field read_only</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Run only on instances who have started below london
if (!pm.isActive('com.snc.best_practice.incident.london')) {
	var dictionaryContactRespGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	dictionaryContactRespGr.addQuery('name', 'contact_responsibility');
	dictionaryContactRespGr.addQuery('element', 'table');
	dictionaryContactRespGr.setWorkflow(false);
	dictionaryContactRespGr.query();
	if (dictionaryContactRespGr.next()) {
		dictionaryContactRespGr.setValue('read_only', false);
		dictionaryContactRespGr.update();
	}

	var dictionaryContactGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	dictionaryContactGr.addQuery('name', 'contact');
	dictionaryContactGr.addQuery('element', 'table');
	dictionaryContactGr.setWorkflow(false);
	dictionaryContactGr.query();
	if (dictionaryContactGr.next()) {
		dictionaryContactGr.setValue('read_only', false);
		dictionaryContactGr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-29 09:23:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>41c2b1b5872333005087af1e36cb0b29</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Contact mgmt - Fix table field read_only</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Contact Management" source="com.snc.contact_management">68cbdebf4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4333</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_41c2b1b5872333005087af1e36cb0b29</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-02 19:58:49</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Contact mgmt - Fix table field read_only
